channel.title: [PI] Autocasting
channel.description:
Alright so, on my project insanity source i wanted to make staff of lights able to autocast.
I could probably do it myself, but where would you put this in, i didnt really see anything for ancient staffs.
Any help is appreciated.

item.title: [PI] Autocasting
item.dc:creator: @Football1smylife Football1smylife
item.description:
@Football1smylife wrote:

Here, I say just use this so you can use any staff.

[code] case 1093:
case 1094:
case 1097:
case 4675:
if (c.autocastId > 0) {
c.getPA().resetAutocast();
} else {
if (c.playerMagicBook == 1) {
c.setSidebarInterface(0, 1689);
} else if (c.playerMagicBook == 0) {
if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 4170) {
c.setSidebarInterface(0, 12050);
} else {
c.setSidebarInterface(0, 1829);
}
}

                            }               
                    break;[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Autocasting
item.dc:creator: @E_z_Range E z Range
item.description:
@E_z_Range wrote:

Works fine for ancient staff but when i try it with the other two staffs it says i cannot auto cast with it.

[code] case 1093:
case 1094:
case 1097:
if (c.autocastId > 0) {
c.getPA().resetAutocast();
} else {
if (c.playerMagicBook == 1) {
if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 4675 || c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 15050)
c.setSidebarInterface(0, 1689);
else
c.sendMessage(“You can’t autocast ancients without an ancient staff.”);
} else if (c.playerMagicBook == 0) {
if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 4170) {
c.setSidebarInterface(0, 12050);
} else {
c.setSidebarInterface(0, 1829);
}
}

			}		
		break;[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Autocasting
item.dc:creator: @Football1smylife Football1smylife
item.description:
@Football1smylife wrote:

Alright, does it work with the ancient staff atleast? Also, add the cases for this method.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Autocasting
item.dc:creator: @E_z_Range E z Range
item.description:
@E_z_Range wrote:

[code] if (c.autocastId > 0) {
c.getPA().resetAutocast();
} else {
if (c.playerMagicBook == 1) {
if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 4675 || c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 15050)
c.setSidebarInterface(0, 1689);
else
c.sendMessage(“You can’t autocast ancients without an ancient staff.”);
} else if (c.playerMagicBook == 0) {
if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 4170) {
c.setSidebarInterface(0, 12050);
} else {
c.setSidebarInterface(0, 1829);
}
}

			}		[/code]

This is all i found with anything having to do with ancient staffs, staff of light and chaotic staffs are added to it now.

Still cannot autocast ancients with them.

Read full topic
